name: HOARD (Weightgaming Gamejam 2022 Entry)
description:
=====================================

THIS PRODUCT IS INTENDED FOR MATURE AUDIENCES ONLY! BY PURCHASING YOU AGREE THAT YOU ARE AT LEAST 18+ YEARS OF AGE.

=====================================

Do YOU want to build an empire of gold-hoarding little kobolds? Now you can! 

---

This year's entry for Weightgaming's 2022 game jam! Them was "greed" and what could be greedier than roping shortstack little lizards into an app-based mlm~?

---

CONTAINS: WEIGHTGAIN/VORE
